segment.source: How to create your folder structure on the computer that you’ll use to build your custom browser package.
segment.target: How to create your folder structure on the computer that you’ll use to build your custom browser package.

segment.source: Create the build computer folder structure using IEAK 11 (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Create the build computer folder structure using IEAK 11 (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Create the build computer folder structure using IEAK 11
segment.target: Create the build computer folder structure using IEAK 11

segment.source: Create your build environment on the computer that you’ll use to build your custom browser package.
segment.target: Create your build environment on the computer that you’ll use to build your custom browser package.

segment.source: Your license agreement determines your folder structure and which version of Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) you’ll use: Internal or External.
segment.target: Your license agreement determines your folder structure and which version of Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) you’ll use: Internal or External.

segment.source: The main, placeholder folder used for all files built by IEAK or that you referenced in your custom package.
segment.target: The main, placeholder folder used for all files built by IEAK or that you referenced in your custom package.

segment.source: You’ll only need this folder if you’re creating your browser package on a network drive.
segment.target: You’ll only need this folder if you’re creating your browser package on a network drive.
